"Xiera":
"Xiera here! Thank you for
helping the Phantom Matoi."

"I told you that I was thinking
while monitoring the Coast..."

"Something else I was thinking
about was how much you've
been fighting, and how you
never get enough rest...
I was thinking about a way to
heal you physically and mentally."

"I guess my jealousy of the ARKS
having fun in swimsuits mixed with
that and became something weird...
Huh? You say it did help heal you?"

"Well, that's good! I was worried
about what would happen, but
it seems like it all worked out OK!"

"Hmm, I see...
Sorry, <%me>, but
I'm going to have to
borrow Xiera for a bit!"

"Huh?! O-of course...!
Oh, why do I feel like I'm
about to get told off...
I'm really sorry!"
